website_summaries.verdict: This beautifully boxed mug makes a great gift for a loved one or yourself. The authentic Irish Celtic design makes it a special memento.
pros: Mug comes in 2 novelty design options and is a great gift
Made of quality stoneware, it’s perfect for everyday use
This mug has a glazed interior and comes in a beautiful gift box
cons: It’s a common misconception that this mug is produced in Ireland
It is actually manufactured in China

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mugs. Very Happy I finally bought them.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but worth it. The have a nice gloss and feel heavy duty. I like that the "Himself" mug has a darker green color than "herself". There is only one thing that annoys the ocd in me. The word "Himself" and "Herself" show the letter "e" above the letter "l" as if they ran out of room in the design. I've eyed these mugs on Amazon for several years. When the quantity got low - I bit the bullet and bought them. Actually I bought 2 of each; one of each to use, and another set for when (hopefully never) something happens to the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Jesrache528

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love anything made by Grasslands Road. Beautifully done. I also have the Herself cup to match this. They are fun and really pretty. They have the teapot to match these and teacups too. This one is shaped more like a mug, and the teacups are more traditionally tea-cup shaped. All of these Celtic products are lovely. I have them arranged together (teapot, 2 mugs, and 2 teacups) on a shelf in my kitchen and I get lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: 5 years old and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this five years ago as part of an anniversary set. We use this mug and another one several times a week. I dishwasher them and pop them into the microwave. They still look as good as the day I gifted them. No scratches or chips. They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: FueledByRamen

customer_reviews.title: A charming coffee mug.
customer_reviews.text: I use this one at work and at home. A great little ceramic mug. It has a minor rattling noise when I shake it coming from the base, but the mug itself seems solid so I don't see a problem with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Fox Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Both arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea. However, both mugs arrived chipped and now I have to deal with returns at Christmas. Also, the quality isn't bad, but up close the details blur. Made in China not Ireland.
customer_reviews.author: MTB51

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coffee mug set
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set. 2 mugs, i 1 Himself and the other is Herself, plus the tea for one teapot with cup. Very nice and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: franfire

customer_reviews.title: It's looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my decor for the room. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: William Boone

customer_reviews.title: Himself was pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it made me feel good to see the big smiles when opened. Our daughter and son-in-law had returned from a long planned trip to Ireland and we thought these cups would be a nice gift for their return. They very obviously were pleased with them. I liked them so much that my husband and I now drink our morning coffee from our himself and herself cups also. Will be ordering three more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Pat O

customer_reviews.title: unique gift
customer_reviews.text: if you are a fan of irish stories and lore, you know that they use "himself" and "herself" to refer to people. a bit of local color. this mug was a perfect gift for a friend who loves coffee and is of irish heritage. it's a generous size, nicely boxed, and much nicer-looking in person than on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Smoosh

customer_reviews.title: Irish mugs- buy a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, attractive coffee mug; a gift, along with the identical “herself” mug to Irish relatives. They have used them and love them.
customer_reviews.author: MDaub

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of what people  say "SIZE MATTERS "
customer_reviews.text: I recently broke a similar coffee mug that I had for nearly twenty years. This cup was very similar and I am very happy !
customer_reviews.author: ron bauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big mug
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my dad for Father's Day. He said it was great. It has a nice quality about it and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NICE BUT SADLY IT IS NOT MADE IN IRELAND AS ...
customer_reviews.text: IT IS NICE BUT SADLY IT IS NOT MADE IN IRELAND AS I EXPECTED. A LABEL OF '' MADE IN CHINA'' WAS ON THE CUP AND BOX. PERHAPS THIS SHOULD BE MENTIONED IN THE DESCRIPTION. I FELT A LITTLE DECEIVED.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Lyons

customer_reviews.title: 'Himself'  Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Grasslands Road Celtic 10-Ounce 'Himself' Irish Coffee Mug, is exactly as pictured. We have never been disappointed with any Grasslands Road products we have ordered and this is no exception. The design is very handsome. The 10 oz. mug size is just right for 'Himself'! 'Herself' is pleased! ~ Mrs. B. ~
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the handle. It feels comfortable in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Mug. I got the himself and herself for christmas, my husband will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Irish
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs no have them Myself and everyone loves them so I ordered a set for my sister
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm Irish so I like it even it was done by fairies and forest dwellers.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sean Toner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid heavy coffee mug, arrived early, no damage, great gift for any Irishman for Easter, going to fill it with jelly beans.
customer_reviews.author: Just Tom

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for shipping it out so quickly! It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Just Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mug for my husband as a birthday gift. It arrived right on time. It looks exactly as in the picture, guess its reasonably priced too. Most importantly he like it:)
customer_reviews.author: Bujji

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in law for Christmas. Bought the matching one for my daughter. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is good, better in these mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mugs, that started off our St Patrick's Day anniversary. Handles are big enough to actually use and keeps the coffee hot. Delivered in a good sturdy box, so no worries about breakage.
customer_reviews.author: RKjell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Before buying I read the description and the question and answers and it said it was made in Ireland yet it came with a made in China sticker on the bottom and no where does it say made in Ireland. While it is pretty I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: design not as visable
customer_reviews.text: everything about the mug is fine except in the ad it looks like they added some brown wash to make the designs pop. this isn't the case in person. less washed so the designs are harder to see than on the amazon ad. still a good mug.
customer_reviews.author: SGT

customer_reviews.title: St. Patrick’s Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent the Himself and Herself mugs to a couple as a St Patrick’s Day/Housewarming gift. They came to me well-packged, so I was able to ship them with confidence they would not break. The coupe loved them.
customer_reviews.author: mamakat

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the other mugs out there
customer_reviews.text: This mug looks exactly like it does in the picture. It's relatively tall for a mug, but it is beautifully designed and very well crafted. My husband's grandfather had a "tis himself" mug that my mother in law uses every time she visits home, and I thought that a special set for her own home would be nice. This mug exceeded my expectations, and I think that it will be a nice surprise for her. I chose this mug because it didn't look as cheap or cartoonish as some of the "himself" mugs out there, and it did not disappoint. I am actually thinking of sending these as Christmas gifts to my husband's aunts next year...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mug as kitchen decor
customer_reviews.text: And to cover some holes in the side of one cabinet. These mugs, (I bought 2) are substantially sized and the handle fit comfortably in your hand. I have not washed this in the dishwasher, nor have I used it. I just love the design and it reminds me of my Belleek without the same price tag.
customer_reviews.author: PansyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: "A fine cup it is"
customer_reviews.text: Now my favorite cup. It is substantial without being too heavy. Nice flare at the top and a good grade of ceramic. Fully sealed and smooth to the touch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cornhusker

customer_reviews.title: Irish Mug
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the coloring! The mug is sturdy and a great size!
customer_reviews.author: sully 54

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a special someone....and I'm very pleased with this mug. It's darker inside than the Herself mug which is disappointing since I would have liked them to match, but I do like the darker green. These mugs are larger than expected, so I am very pleased with them. I will update if there are any issues with use, since they are a gift I won't know til later this summer how they perform.
customer_reviews.author: B. Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup for my husband. We had another one for him for years, but, sadly it broke. This is a great replacement and he now can proudly use his "himself" cup again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Had to keep exchanging these, many flaws. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to keep exchanging these, many flaws. I finally settled for one with a minor flaw. Seller worked diligently to replace items.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Bodine

customer_reviews.title: It came as promised in excellent packaging. Thank You
customer_reviews.text: This is to be a Christmas gift for my son. It came as promised in excellent packaging. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: cajaskowiak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. Perfect for various portion options of the Kerig
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Mims

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Irish mug
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a dear Irish friend who loves it. It is a great size and of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Yanity

customer_reviews.title: It Was A Hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mug for my husband for his birthday. He loves it! I would love to own the whole set. It's beautifully made and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Tea + Tacos

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the image onine was not representative of the poor quality product. color was not accurate, penmanship was very poor and looked like it was added after manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: 💚Deku Cosplayer💚

customer_reviews.title: Grasslands Road cups Himself & Herslf
customer_reviews.text: These cups are beautiful weighted perfectly not to lite or to heavy I give them a 5 * rating will absolutely buy from from this company again I very highly recommend these cups I love my Amazon !!!! Worth what you pay for them
customer_reviews.author: Linda King

customer_reviews.title: Just great! I have a whole set of these
customer_reviews.text: Just great! I have a whole set of these, all from the same "family" - it's a celtic love affair. :)
customer_reviews.author: Pivoine Pink

customer_reviews.title: Irish coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Grasslands Road Celtic 10-ounce Irish Coffee Mug. It will make a wonderful Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS A HIT
customer_reviews.text: Brought a set of mugs. Himself and Herself for parents St. Patricks Day. They LOVED them, something they can use all year not just for St. Paddy's day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great irishman gift
customer_reviews.text: my son enjoys his coffee every day. a true Irishman was surprizes when he opened pkg.shows to all friends. some show jealous streak
customer_reviews.author: jrincker

product_meta.title: Grasslands Road Celtic 10-Ounce"Himself" Irish Coffee Mug, Gift Boxed
product_meta.description:
Size:10 Ounce
Grasslands Road, a division of Amscan Inc., is a leading wholesale supplier of everyday and seasonal gift, home décor, and tabletop collections. 

We are a design-driven company who focuses on creating unique, exclusive gift product that enriches lives, brings people closer together and celebrates life. Grasslands Road, simply stated, creates "Gifts That Inspire." Grasslands Road Celtic 10-ounce "Himself" Irish coffee mug, gift boxed. Distinctive design. Our "Himself" Irish Coffee Mug is inscribed with the traditional Celtic title of the man of the house and features sculpted scrollwork on a creamy, 10 oz. ceramic mug.
feature_bullets: High gloss finish with relief pattern Celtic knotting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
